description: Marvelous and sweet aroma with a flavorful distinctive fruitiness. Full bodied and excellent acidity.
title: African Ultimate Brand

description: A blend of coffees from Central and South America. Mild and balanced with a fruity scent and a chocolate and nutty finish.
title: American Breakfast

description: The finest gourmet coffee roasted to a deep dark color. Bold, complex and full bodied with a smoky aroma.
title: Columbia Classic

description: This coffee has all the soothing characteristics of our Colombian Supremo without the caffeine. The finest gourmet coffees roasted to a deep dark color to create savory and balanced finish notes.
title: Decaf Colombia Classic

description: A unique blend is roasted to achieve a smooth and rich aroma. To create combine smoky, full bodied dark roast coffee. This combination creates a flavorful, robust brew that is both savory and smooth.
title: Dexter Cafe

description: 100% Arabica coffee from Africa and Asia. A bold cup with hints of ripe fruit finish. Heavy bodied and intense flavor with a light acidity.
title: Dexter Java

description: The finest gourmet coffees roasted to a deep dark color. Darker than Viennese, but lighter than our Italian Espresso.
title: French Roast

description: Coffee roasted to create a creamy vanilla flavor creating a superb coffee drinking experience.
title: French Vanilla

description: Coffee roasted to create a delightfully smooth hazelnut flavor with a creamy, light and nutty finish.
title: Hazelnut

description: Roasted dark to highlight the characteristics of this specialty coffee. The flavor is a clean , balanced finish with a full bodied unique flavor.
title: Italian Espresso

description: High grown Peruvian coffees roasted dark to create notes of citrus. A creamy mouthful with toffee and caramel notes.
title: Organic Coffee Peru Height

description: A blend of coffees from Colombia , Central America and Asia. Roasted dark to cerate a soft and delicious cup with a berry flavor finish.
title: Rich Aroma Colombia Blend

description: Beans sourced from Colombian which are of the highest grade. These beans are all of the largest size uniform and without imperfections. The finest gourmet coffees roasted to a deep dark color. Darker than Viennese, but lighter than our Italian Espresso.
title: Single Origen Columbia Supremo

description: From the Indonesian island of Sumatra, Mandheling is known for its full, strong body and light acidity. Its flavor is rich with a touch of chocolate overtones.
title: Sumantra Opulence
